testcase.title: 001)Check Chinese locale is displayed on Conferences Report Page for localization

steps.title: I logged in as a "Localization" user with access to "CE-4" project

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly and Locale Icon is Displayed

steps.title: the "HomePage" page should be loaded on log on with Locale Dropdown
I verify "Chinese" language should listed under the Locale Dropdown and Select check-box against Chinese

substeps.message: Index Search Linked Clicked User clicked on the Index Search Link

steps.title: I perform Quick Search by term "cancer"
I click on Conferences dataset in the result page
I click on "random" report link from the results table

substeps.message: Confrence Report pageLoaded Properly With Chinese Text

On 'Conferences' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'conferenceReportSection' with the key 'conferenceReportSection' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI REPORT are NOT matching

On 'Conferences' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'export.caption' with the key 'export.caption' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI Download are NOT matching
